title.native: 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド
title.english: The Duke of Death and His Maid

description:
How can you fall in love when you can’t even hold hands? Due to a childhood curse, anything that the Duke touches will die—which makes his flirty maid’s behavior all the more shocking! Is there a way for the Duke and his companions to somehow break the curse, or is he doomed to a life where love is forever out of his reach?

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: คุณชายวิปริตกับเมดสาวรอบจัด

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Butler
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

name.native: アリス・レンドロット
シャロン・レンドロット

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

__Height:__ 173 cm
__Hobbies:__ Karaoke, gaming
__Agency:__ Across Entertainment

[Profile](http://across-ent.com/talent/men/natsuki_hanae.html) | [Website](https://columbia.jp/hanaenatsuki/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hanae0626) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3C3YOGFjn7Pq3lOCeUFHfg) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/hanae0626/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hanae_natsuki0626/)

Won Best Rookie at the 9th Seiyuu Awards (2015) for his role as Inaho Kaizuka in _Aldnoah.Zero_. Won Best Lead Actor at the 14th Seiyuu Awards (2020) for his role as Tanjiro Kamado in _Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba_.

He is married, is a father of twin daughters, and has a cat named [Konpei](https://anilist.co/staff/269430/Konpei).

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Protagonist - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Ling Yang - Wuthering Waves (VG)

__Height:__ 173 cm
__Hobbies:__ Karaoke, gaming
__Agency:__ Across Entertainment

[Profile](http://across-ent.com/talent/men/natsuki_hanae.html) | [Website](https://columbia.jp/hanaenatsuki/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hanae0626) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3C3YOGFjn7Pq3lOCeUFHfg) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/hanae0626/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hanae_natsuki0626/)

Won Best Rookie at the 9th Seiyuu Awards (2015) for his role as Inaho Kaizuka in _Aldnoah.Zero_. Won Best Lead Actor at the 14th Seiyuu Awards (2020) for his role as Tanjiro Kamado in _Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba_.

He is married, is a father of twin daughters, and has a cat named [Konpei](https://anilist.co/staff/269430/Konpei).

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Protagonist - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Ling Yang - Wuthering Waves (VG)

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mill_sister)** | **[Website (blog)](https://blog.goo.ne.jp/gooussy)**

Kiyoko Sayama is a Japanese director, episode director, animation director and storyboard artist.

Married to [Tetsuya Kumagai](https://anilist.co/staff/101548/Tetsuya-Kumagai).

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/guimarques78/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/guimarques78)

Guilherme Marques is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and architect.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Dickon Tarly (Game of Thrones)
- Antonio Garcia / Gold Samurai Ranger (2nd voice; Power Rangers: Samurai)
- Shisui Uchiha (Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 and Naruto X Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections)
- Mr. Phillip Frond (2nd voice - 2nd season onwards; Bob's Burgers)
- Travis Marshall (Dexter)
- Pietro Maximoff / Quiksilver (LEGO Marvel's Avengers)
- Joseph Turner (Call of Duty: WWII)
- George Takei (2nd voice; Futurama)
- Harald Fairhair (Assassin's Creed Valhalla)
- Chief (2nd dub; The Fox and the Hound)
- Amang Paso and Bantay (Trese)
- Sergeant Kong Chul-Ho (Descendants of the Sun)
- Joseph Campbell (Rick and Morty)
- Ricpon (Power Rangers Ninja Steel)
- David Hasselhoff (Close Enough)
